When your minions are destroyed, attach them to this card instead of sending them to the graveyard. You can resummon them at the start of your next turn. If this card is destroyed, so are the attached minions.

ability1: Ability Name: Tainted Ground; Ability Effect: At the start of your turn, you may designate an enemy minion slot. Minions in that slot have their Attack and Defense reduced by 2 until you choose a different slot.
ability2: Ability Name: Aura of Decay; Ability Effect: At the end of your turn, each enemy character adjacent to another character takes 2 damage.
ability3: Ability Name: Fury of the Void; Ability Effect: If you control no minions at the start of your turn, ensnare an enemy minion, preventing it from following Minion Commands for one round.
ability4: Ability Name: Shifting Sands; Ability Effect: You may pay 2 Lifeforce to move an enemy minion to a different slot on its controller's field.

ability1: Ability Name: Remnants of the Past; Ability Effect: Instead of drawing a card from your deck during your draw phase, you may draw a card of your choice from your graveyard. If you do, send the top card of your deck to the graveyard.
ability2: Ability Name: Moment of Ascension; Ability Effect: Once during your turn, when you draw a card from your deck or graveyard that costs 5 or less, you may play it for free this turn. If you do, banish it at the end of the turn.
ability3: Ability Name: Hand of the Forgotten King; Ability Effect: Once during your turn, you may pay 2 Lifeforce to return a banished card to your deck.
ability4: Ability Name: Path to the Afterlife; Ability Effect: Once during your turn, you may pay 2 Lifeforce to send a card from your deck to the graveyard.

ability1: Ability Name: Scorching Sunfire; Ability Effect: Once during your turn, you may pay 2 Lifeforce to inflict 2 damage to the enemy hero.
ability2: Ability Name: Wrath of the Sun God; Ability Effect: At the start of your turn, select an enemy hero. If they control more minions than you, inflict damage to them equal to the difference up to a max of 2 damage.
ability3: Ability Name: Burning Vengeance; Ability Effect: Once during your turn, if an enemy hero takes at least 5 damage, force them to discard a card from their hand.
ability4: Ability Name: Pyre of Souls; Ability Effect: Once during your turn, you may choose three cards from your graveyard, remove them from the game then draw a card.

ability1: Ability Name: Spellweaver's Boon; Ability Effect: The first spell you cast from your hand each turn costs 2 less Lifeforce.
ability2: Ability Name: Spellfire Mastery; Ability Effect: Your Magic cards inflict 1 extra damage.
ability3: Ability Name: Reclaimed Knowledge; Ability Effect: Once during your turn, you may pay 2 Lifeforce to return a spell from your graveyard to your hand.
ability4: Ability Name: Arcane Restoration; Ability Effect: Once per turn, you may pay 3 Lifeforce to either heal a hero for 3 or give a minion +2 Defense until the end of the turn.

effects: When this minion attacks an ensnared minion, it gains +2 Attack.

effects: Once during each of your turns, inflict 1 damage to an enemy minion.

traits: A minion across from this minion has its attack reduced by 2 and its defense by 1.
effects: This minion can attack twice. It cannot attack the same target more than once per turn. After each attack, it may move to an open friendly minion slot.

effects: On a 1-2, gain 2 Lifeforce. On a 3-4, draw a card. On a 5-6, inflict 2 damage to an enemy Hero.
